content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I asked the AI to browse the Clockify time tracking software website and learned that it offers various features such as timekeeping, timesheets, calendar, auto tracker, reporting, management, invoicing, and expenses. The software has received positive reviews from users and offers 24/7 customer support. Links to other related websites were also provided.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "clockify_info.txt", "text": "Clockify is a free time tracking software that allows users to track work hours across projects, manage tasks and projects, and communicate with teams. The software offers various features such as timekeeping, timesheets, calendar, auto tracker, reporting, management, invoicing, and expenses. It works across devices and can be used for boosting productivity, billing clients, managing teams, and streamlining processes. The software has received positive reviews from users and offers 24/7 customer support."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command write_to_file returned: File written to successfully.', type='action_result')]
"""
